item.title: A hobbist introduction to the kivy framework
item.description:
Description

Montreal, June 9, 2014 - Ghislain Hivon presents kivy, a Python library for rapid development of applications that make use of innovative user interfaces, such as multi-touch apps.

Useful links:

  • Ghislain: https://twitter.com/GhislainHivon
  • Kivy: http://kivy.org
  • MP47: http://sflx.ca/mp47
  • Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
  • Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
item.dc:creator: Ghislain Hivon
